title: 服务器报错
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 19-7-29 下午5:44
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.InterruptedException: sleep interrupted
        at java.lang.Thread.sleep(Native Method)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:616)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
分界线
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Shall we play a game?

Time: 19-7-30 下午8:20
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.ThreadDeath
        at java.lang.Thread.stop(Unknown Source)
        at org.spigotmc.WatchdogThread.run(WatchdogThread.java:85)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- 
服务器老是崩溃刷这俩报错

replies.author: 沉默-钟
replies.txt_content:
Mine_永恒 发表于 2019-7-31 10:22
Watchdog删了试试？
watchdog不是spigot自带的吗？

replies.author: shenren3-f
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
Watchdog的监测机制认为你的服务端假死，于是结束了你的服务端线程
这种情况下你应该发送least.log而不是crash-report
不过没关系，可以通过关闭Watchdog的方式来解决问题
在spigot.yml中找到max-tick-time，将下设的两个50改为-1即可解决问题

replies.txt_content:
2776495894 发表于 2019-7-31 20:08
已更新Java了没用
那就有两种可能
1.catserver自身终止线程，请找开发者解决
2.插件/系统/mod使进程被强制结束
